channel.title: First Person Max2011 Bone Rig
channel.description:
I've gone ahead and made a very simple IK rig for BMS. It just uses the weighted mesh and all but one bone from the reference .smd. No fancy controllers here boys, just two dummies and some IK.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xji7Evx5DtQ[/url] [url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/tng6aij3gf8qxmz/HH_BMS%20Rig.zip[/url]
Have fun.
Edit: You might need to play with the Smooth modifier if you notice some smoothing errors/lack of smoothing.

item.title: First Person Max2011 Bone Rig
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I dunno, ejecting the round in the barrel on that G3 set was a nice touch. Of course, the smart thing to do would have been to leave the round in the barrel so you can fire it at someone in an emergency during a reload if needed. I think GRAW had that ability.

As for BM’s weapons, the only real beef I have is with the MP5. The ghost ring sight at the front lacks the middle post to aim with if Gordon ever bothered to use the sights. Admittedly this is probably to maintain consistency with the model in the original HL (because it, too, lacked that post) but from a visuals standpoint it’s inconsistent and a rather perplexing omission. Both pistols have the irons intact, and the Magnum’s are usable to boot, so why not?

Also, when reloading, the bolt closes by itself. I would have rigged the hand to do an ‘HK Slap’ on the bolt to synch up with that. I’m guessing the self closing bolt is probably a result of an animation like that being cut because it wasn’t fast enough, much like the reload for the M203.

Read full topic

item.title: First Person Max2011 Bone Rig
item.dc:creator: SiCaRiO
item.description:
oh how cute, he things texture work and ironsights have anything to do with reload animations , arent you a sweatheart?? ita ok, everyone makes mistakes .

and no, before anyone with the brainpower of a fork says it, im not auggesting realiatic reloads for black mesa, it just doesnt fit. I just said that calling an animation borig becauae is realistic its just stupid an ussualy said by the ADHD kids who cant stand 0.5 seconds without firing before crying hurrr akshun!!!

Read full topic

item.title: First Person Max2011 Bone Rig
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I want to see someone try to remake the HL1 glock animations, position and everything (well maybe not the reload)

Though I already really liked the BMS glock, it would be more nostalgic seeing it closer to the middle of the screen and lower so you can see more of the top.
